Class ProgrammingLanguage

java.lang.Object
Language
ProgrammingLanguage
Direct Known Subclasses:
OOPLanguage
public class ProgrammingLanguage extends Language
This class models a specific type of language, a programming language.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ProgrammingLanguage(int _learningMonths)
    The default constructor creates 1 instance (1 object) of the class ProgrammingLanguage, in this case an alphabet based one and with 0 world speakers.
    ProgrammingLanguage(int _numWorldSpeakers, int _learningMonths)
    The constructor creates 1 instance (1 object) of the class ProgrammingLanguage.
    Please note a programmingLanguage must be alphabet based.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    int
    computeSalary()
    Given a concrete ProgrammingLanguage (this), the function overrides the Language method to compute the average salary of a worker speaking the ProgrammingLanguage.
    The logic is as follows:
    The salary is the same as for a Language speaker, but an extra 1,000 is added per each month needed to learn the programming language.
    int
    getLearningMonths()
    Given a concrete ProgrammingLanguage (this), the function gets the months needed to master the language.
    void
    setAlphabetBased(boolean _alphabetBased)
    Given a concrete Language (this), this function overrides the parent method, as a programming language must be alphabet based, regardless of the value of _alphabetBased passed as parameter.
    void
    setLearningMonths(int _learningMonths)
    Given a concrete ProgrammingLanguage (this), the function updates the months needed to master the language.

    Methods inherited from class Language

    computeSalary, getAlphabetBased, getNumWorldSpeakers, setNumWorldSpeakers

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • ProgrammingLanguage

      public ProgrammingLanguage(int _numWorldSpeakers, int _learningMonths)
      The constructor creates 1 instance (1 object) of the class ProgrammingLanguage.
      Please note a programmingLanguage must be alphabet based.
      Parameters:
      _numWorldSpeakers - - Number of world speakers (measured in millions).
      _learningMonths - - The months needed to master the language.

    • ProgrammingLanguage

      public ProgrammingLanguage(int _learningMonths)
      The default constructor creates 1 instance (1 object) of the class ProgrammingLanguage, in this case an alphabet based one and with 0 world speakers.
      Parameters:
      _learningMonths - - The months needed to master the language.

  • Method Details

    • getLearningMonths

      public int getLearningMonths()
      Given a concrete ProgrammingLanguage (this), the function gets the months needed to master the language.
      Returns:
      The months needed to master the language.

    • setLearningMonths

      public void setLearningMonths(int _learningMonths)
      Given a concrete ProgrammingLanguage (this), the function updates the months needed to master the language.
      Parameters:
      _learningMonths - - The months needed to master the language..

    • setAlphabetBased

      public void setAlphabetBased(boolean _alphabetBased)
      Given a concrete Language (this), this function overrides the parent method, as a programming language must be alphabet based, regardless of the value of _alphabetBased passed as parameter.
      Overrides:
      setAlphabetBased in class Language
      Parameters:
      _alphabetBased - - Whether the language is based on an alphabet.

    • computeSalary

      public int computeSalary()
      Given a concrete ProgrammingLanguage (this), the function overrides the Language method to compute the average salary of a worker speaking the ProgrammingLanguage.
      The logic is as follows:
      The salary is the same as for a Language speaker, but an extra 1,000 is added per each month needed to learn the programming language.
      Overrides:
      computeSalary in class Language
      Returns:
      - The average salary of a worker speaking the language.
